title: Chuck Schumer will give campaign donations from Silicon Valley Bank's ex-CEO, PAC to charity
description: The Senate Majority Leader Schumer received campaign donations from both the CEO and political action committee of shuttered Silicon Valley Bank.

title: Cathay's CEO wants to turn the airline back to profitability, but faces manpower constraints
description: Cathay Pacific hopes to be profitable again in 2023, but returning to its pre-pandemic capacity is going to be a challenge, its CEO told CNBC.

title: Ex-fugitive in $100 million New Jersey deli case leaves Thailand for U.S. court hearing
description: Three men are charged with alleged stock manipulation of Hometown International, which owned just a money-losing New Jersey deli.

title: SVB execs sold $84 million in stock over the past 2 years, stoking outrage over insider trading plans
description: Altogether, Silicon Valley Bank executives and directors cashed out of $84 million worth of stock over the past two years, according to Smart Insider.

title: Carl Icahn says our economy is breaking because of inflation and poor corporate leadership
description: Famed activist and raider Carl Icahn believes the U.S. economy is in trouble because of poor corporate leadership and stubbornly high inflation.

title: Private equity firms Apollo and KKR among those reviewing Silicon Valley Bank loans
description: Private equity firms Apollo Global Management and KKR are among the parties reviewing a book of loans held by Silicon Valley Bank, CNBC has learned.

title: Apple reportedly delaying some employee bonuses as the company cuts costs
description: The shift is the latest example that Apple is cutting costs and watching corporate expenses closely during a rough patch for the tech industry.

title: Harvard career expert: The 'highly desirable' skill successful people have—it is 'surprisingly rare'
description: Career success isn't just about individual accomplishments, says Harvard professor and business expert Heidi K. Gardner. Based on 10 years of research, she says collaboration skills are the most rare and often overlooked. Here's how to get better at it.

title: Russian jet downs U.S. Reaper drone over Black Sea
description: The U.S. called the downing of the drone by a Russian jet part of a pattern of reckless behavior by Russia.

title: Charles Schwab CEO says firm is seeing significant inflows and that he bought the stock Tuesday
description: "What we're seeing is asset inflows to the firm in significant numbers," Bettinger told CNBC.

title: SVB's new CEO urges clients to 'help us rebuild our deposit base'
description: Tim Mayopoulos, who was appointed by regulators to run SVB, sent an email to clients on Tuesday telling them the bank is in business and wants their deposits.

title: Early retiree says these 8 books helped him save $1 million and 'live an uncompromisingly happy life'
description: Self-made millionaire Steve Adcock retired early at 35. He didn't accumulate wealth from an inheritance or by running his own business. Instead, he learned to save and be successful in his career by reading. Here are the books that helped him achieve his goals.

title: Moody's cuts outlook on U.S. banking system to negative, citing 'rapidly deteriorating operating environment'
Meta to lay off 10,000 more workers after initial cuts in November
description: Meta is laying off 10,000 more employees following a major round of job cuts in November.

title: Canada is aiming to beat China in the critical race for rare earth metals
description: Canada wants to be the solution to many European governments looking to rely less on China for critical raw materials.

title: Boeing sells 78 Dreamliner planes to Saudi airlines
description: Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman announced the launch of a new airline, Riyadh Air, airline over the weekend.

title: Inflation gauge increased 0.4% in February, as expected and up 6% from a year ago
First Republic shares jump 20% as regional banks try to rebound from Monday’s sell-off
description: The stock traded 20% higher in the premarket and was one of the best-performing names in the SPDR S&P Regional Banking ETF (KRE) — which was up 5%.

title: Credit Suisse finds 'material weaknesses' in financial reporting, says outflows 'not yet reversed'
description: Credit Suisse said its net asset outflows had "not yet reversed," and that "material weaknesses" were identified in its financial reporting processes.

title: As global stocks fall, Asia-Pacific's benchmark index erases all of its gains for 2023
description: Asia-Pacific's leading index erased its year-to-date gains and is now flat in 2023 as bank stocks led declines Tuesday.

title: Volkswagen announces five-year $193 billion investment plan as electrification gathers pace
description: More than two thirds of Volkswagen's planned five-year investment will target "electrification and digitalization."

title: SVB fallout unlikely to affect fundraising for Southeast Asia startups, venture capitalists say
description: Industry experts are optimistic that fundraising for Southeast Asian tech startups will keep flowing and won't be impacted by the collapse of SVB.

title: The U.S. stock market keeps beating Europe in new listings. And it's no fluke
description: There are two main reasons why U.S. stock markets are more attractive for new listings, analysts said.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Banks got hammered by SVB's collapse. But the Fed might still raise rates
description: Bank stocks had a very rough Monday in the aftermath of Silicon Valley Bank’s implosion. The 2-year Treasury yield plummeted.
